p: The dose response with geranyl acetate showed that this compound has lower toxicity than citral in third-instar P. nigrispinus nymphs, with LD 50 = 33.44 (30.99–37.23) μg/insect −1 and LD 90 = 48.34 (42.78–59.99) μg/insect −1, compared to LD 50 = 25.56 (23.98–27.60) μg/insect −1 and LD 90 = 35.39 (32.15–41.61) μg/insect −1 for the citral (Fig. 1).
